about_the_game:
Hide Time is a story-driven horror game filled with huge variety of puzzles where you play as an new employee of Passion Oasis. Explore that huge complex, do your tasks and uncover mysteries of your past.

Welcome to Passion Oasis, a place where you can express yourself and have lots and lots of fun. Your main job will be to make sure the place is ready for the grand opening next week.

This game is centered around solving puzzles. Use all equipment around the area to complete your job - Prepare Passion Oasis for the opening day!
Fix mechanisms, use your flashlight to navigate through dark areas, hide in lockers if needed! Do everything to make sure the location is in perfect state and most importantly have fun!

You play as John Evans - a brand new employee at Passion Oasis. Stay in touch with your manager - Mark Smith via walkie-talkie as he guides you towards your next objective. Uncover the past of the DJ Cat's brand as well as your own. Passion Oasis hides a lot of secrets waiting to be discovered.

It is a huge mall full of many attractions and fun activites. This place can offer you tasty food and drinks in places such as Cozy Corner Coffee and Sweet Lounge. Meet the all time favorite mascot - DJ Cat and enjoy your time in locations such as Party Rooms. Do not forget to have fun because fun should always be number one.


Meet DJ Cat - the best dj in the world who is the main face of Passion Oasis. His first design was made in 1993 and even though his apperance has changed many times his personality never changed. He is a very cool cat who always wishes best for his friends.

-Intriguing and complex story,
-Varied gameplay,
-Many distinct looking places and locations,
-Original art-style,
-Tons of secrets and lore elements to find.
